desc: Celestial Stones is an online crystal shop located in Tasmania. We offer a large range of high quality, unique, hand selected Crystals. For all your Crystal, Tarot & Oracle and Incense needs, we have got you covered. Buy Now, Pay Later with Afterpay, Laybuy, ZipPay & Klarna.

layout.text: Herkimer Diamonds are the most powerful of all Quartz crystals. Being double terminated, they have the ability to not only transmit their own energies, but to receive spiritual energy and to amplify and focus it intently
